document_data.name: Paethier's Pipeweed
document_data.mainbody: '''Paethier's Pipeweed''' was a [[pipeweed]] shop located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Paethier's Pipeweed was located in the northern section of the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] on the north side of [[Trader's Way (Waterdeep)|Trader's Way]] near the [[Market (Waterdeep)|Market]].
